content.en: Process Mining Advancements: Process mining algorithms are being developed to address various challenges in analyzing and improving operational processes. These algorithms can effectively handle non-free-choice constructs, make invisible tasks visible, and handle separately managed procedures. They can also improve the quality of discovered process models, assess event log quality, and uncover causal relations. By leveraging these algorithms, researchers are finding ways to enhance the applicability of process mining and generate valuable insights for managing and controlling processes.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for procesmining: Procesmining-algoritmer udvikles til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i analysen og forbedringen af operationelle processer. Disse algoritmer kan effektivt håndtere non-free-choice-konstruktioner, gøre usynlige opgaver synlige og håndtere separat administrerede procedurer. De kan også forbedre kvaliteten af opdagede procesmodeller, vurdere kvaliteten af event logs og afsløre kausale relationer. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmer finder forskere måder at forbedre anvendeligheden af procesmining og generere værdifulde indsigter til styring og kontrol af processer.
